ImageBinPlot 0.0.1.0000
  • Reference

ImageBinPlot: Create a Spatial Binning Plot

ImageBinPlot.Rd

This function creates a spatial binning plot for a specified gene or molecule in a Seurat object. It allows for optional overlay of identity classes and customization of bin size, color scale, and other parameters.

Usage

ImageBinPlot(
  obj,
  feature,
  group.by = NULL,
  x_col = "x",
  y_col = "y",
  fov = NULL,
  x_min = NULL,
  x_max = NULL,
  y_min = NULL,
  y_max = NULL,
  bin_size = 10,
  max_multiplier = NULL,
  min = 0,
  max_quantile = "q75",
  type = "expression",
  assay = "Xenium",
  layer = "count",
  palette = c("viridis", "inferno", "magma", "plasma", "cividis", "mako", "rocket",
    "turbo"),
  palette_begin = 0,
  palette_end = 1,
  ident_alpha = 0.3,
  ident_pointsize = 1,
  filter_ident = NULL,
  feature_on_top = TRUE,
  flip_y = TRUE
)

Arguments

obj

Seurat object

feature

Gene to visualize

group.by

Identity class to overlay (optional)

x_col

Column name for x-coordinates (default: "x")

y_col

Column name for y-coordinates (default: "y")

fov

Field of view to visualize (optional)

x_min

Minimum x-coordinate (optional)

x_max

Maximum x-coordinate (optional)

y_min

Minimum y-coordinate (optional)

y_max

Maximum y-coordinate (optional)

bin_size

Size of bins in micrometers (default: 10)

max_multiplier

Maximum multiplier for color scale (deprecated)

min

Minimum value for color scale (default: 0)

max_quantile

Maximum quantile for color scale (default: "q75")

type

Type of data to visualize ("expression" or "molecule", default: "expression")

assay

Assay to use for fetching data (default: "Xenium")

layer

Layer to use for fetching data (default: "count")

palette

Color palette to use (default: c("viridis", "inferno", "magma", "plasma", "cividis", "mako", "rocket", "turbo"))

palette_begin

Start of color palette (default: 0)

palette_end

End of color palette (default: 1)

ident_alpha

Alpha level for identity overlay (default: 0.3)

ident_pointsize

Point size for identity overlay (default: 1)

filter_ident

Optional filter for identity overlay

feature_on_top

Whether to place feature layer on top of identity overlay (default: TRUE)

flip_y

Whether to flip the y-axis (default: TRUE)

Value

A ggplot object representing the spatial binning plot

Examples

ImageBinPlot(seurat_obj, feature = "GeneA", group.by = "cell_type", bin_size = 20)
#> Error in Images(obj): could not find function "Images"
ImageBinPlot(seurat_obj, feature = "GeneB", type = "molecule", bin_size = 50)
#> Error in Images(obj): could not find function "Images"
